Home → Schools, literacy and reading → Literacy, Books and Reading Team for Schools → Curriculum topic loan

Curriculum topic loan

Complete this form to request a curriculum topic loan from the Literacy, Books and Reading Team for Schools (LBRTS). Your request must reach us not later than two weeks before the end of term.

Contact your local Literacy, Books and Reading Team for Schools office for more help.
